Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS IN THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A GRANT APPLICATION PROGRAM WHICH REQUIRES ALL RECIPIENTS TO DESCRIBE THE PURPOSE OF THEIR ORGANIZATION, PROVIDE THEIR TAX EXEMPT STATUS, PROVIDE FINANCIAL RECORDS OF THEIR OPERATIONS AND THE PURPOSE FOR WHICH THE GRANT WILL BE USED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: RICHARD SCHIMEL HAS A BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP WITH TANHYA VANCHO. WHITNEY SIDERMAN MICHAELS IS THE DAUGHTER OF HARVEY J SIDERMAN.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FEDERAL FORM 990 WILL BE REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND TREASURER.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION IMPLEMENTS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IN APRIL 2011. THE POLICY REQUIRES EACH BOARD MEMBER TO SIGN AN ANNUAL STATEMENT.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION IS A MEMBER OF THE ASSOCIATION OF SMALL FOUNDATIONS AND UTILIZES THEIR FOUNDATION SALARY AND BENEFITS ANNUAL REPORT FOR DETERMINING THE AMOUNT PAID FOR GRANT DEVELOPMENT & MANAGMENT CONSULTANT.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ITS FEDERAL FORM 990 LISTED ON GUIDESTAR.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENT AVAILABLE BY REQUEST IN PDF FORMAT. THE BY-LAWS ARE ON FILE IF SOMEONE REQUESTS TO SEE THEM.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND TREASURER THAT ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
